name: Print CSS Fix
tagline: An easy to link CSS media fix for print layouts whilst helping to put people off printing websites!
body:
### The Fix
After some much needed research the PrintCSSFix helps to solve the headache that is making sure your site looks amazing when in print!. Not that having a responsive template is enough, or even making it look great on old Nokia Phones is enough work, now you can link printcssfix.css and all will be 'fixed'.

**Take a look at what the fix does by print previewing the page (or print it if you want too!)**

```
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://raw.github.com/billsmithit/PrintCSSFix/master/printfix.css">
```
OR do the normal git thing:
```
$ https://github.com/billsmithit/PrintCSSFix.git
```

Feel free to contribute or tweet any further updates to @billsmithit

### Designer Notes
No need to worry about the design, the PrintCSSFix analysis your design, in detail. Then it wipes it clean and lays down up to 40 pages of pure, dark, sexy black ink. You can't get any more web 2.0 or flat then the PrintCSSFix

### Authors and Contributors
With thanks to [@billsmithit](http://www.twitter.com/billsmithit) and [@IamDevloper](https://twitter.com/iamdevloper)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Print out?. Just reprint.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
